title: Defold is now open source and transferred to the Defold Foundation
body:
STOCKHOLM, SWEDEN - May 19, 2020 - We are happy to announce that Defold, the ultimate cross platform game engine, is available as an open source project! This move will bring transparency to the development process and invite external contributors to make the engine better for everyone. As part of the open source process, King has decided to transfer Defold to a software foundation; the Defold Foundation. This will further strengthen Defold as an open source project and establish the future of Defold in the hands of the Defold Foundation together with the community and industry partners.
